body_html: Any thoughts on this? I looked through the embedding_rnn_seq2seq function and it looks like it builds from get_variables and variable_scope throughout. Even though there's a reuse_variables in, for example, the "RNN" scope, I would think that this would be in a different domain given that the top level scope is different ("en-10000-256-2-10000" vs "de-10000-256-2-10000")
